name: Spin (RichardKopelow)
description:
Spin is a game about matching colors. Spin 2x2 tile sections to group all the tiles of the same color so that they touch.

This game is currently in open beta on the Google Play Store

It doesn't look like the Play store beta link will stick so here it is:  https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.RichardKopelow.Spin
